Creator: Poley, H. S. (Horace Swartley)
Summary: Native American (tribe unknown) man stands on a pile of stone masonry bricks, possibly at the Tsankawi Ruins, at Bandelier National Monument, New Mexico. The bricks stand on a rocky desert landscape. The mesas of the Pajarito Plateau stand in the distance.
Description: 1 photonegative : glass ; 8 x 11 cm. (3 1/2 x 4 1/2 in.); 1 photoprint ; 6 x 9 cm. (2 1/2 x 3 1/2 in.)
Is Part Of: C Photo Collection 37. H. S. Poley collection.
Type of Material: Glass negatives.; Photographic prints.; Imaged.; Image
